item.title: Python
item.description: library(reticulate) Sys.setenv(RETICULATE_PYTHON="/usr/bin/python") use_python("/usr/bin/python") Python can be used to filter out important information using regular expressions. I created a list of birthdays for 7 different people. import re string_bdays=" David: 09.06.62, Aida: 09.22.65, Brian: 03.22.87, Wendy: 06.03.89, Dorian: 10.18.2006, Sabastian: 07.19.09, Sergio: 12.02.97, Alisha: 06.11.98" print(string_bdays) #Here I filtered out all of the birthdays ## David: 09.06.62, Aida: 09.22.65, Brian: 03.22.87, Wendy: 06.03.89, Dorian: 10.18.2006, Sabastian: 07.19.09, Sergio: 12.02.97, Alisha: 06.
